@The Optimist: rightclick control surfaces to assign just the movement you want for each control ( don't just shove the sliders all the way left, that will set them all negative ), and then hit "k" over each control to set up Dynamic Deflection. If you fly a plane around with the FAR flight data window open it will show you dynamic pressure, which is the left side of the dynamic deflection entries.

I found a workaround (kind of) for the changes of settings in FAR after fights. If you go back to the hangar and reload the plane from the save, the settings goes back to where they were before the fight.

Also @The Optimist: I recon you should loose the small engines at the bottom of the plane as the rules states "Engines are limited to turbojets/turboramjets"
